thread.title: BRIEF-Time2u International Holding Expects To Record A Consol. Net Loss For Year Ended 31 Dec 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Time2u International Holding Expects To Record A Consol. Net Loss For Year Ended 31 Dec 2017
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Time2u International Holding Ltd :
* TIME2U INTERNATIONAL HOLDING LTD - GROUP EXPECTED TO RECORD A CONSOLIDATED NET LOSS FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* TIME2U INTERNATIONAL -EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO REALISED AND UNREALISED LOSS ON FINANCIAL ASSETS OF ABOUT HK$30.2 MILLION AND HK$60.1 MILLION RESPECTIVELY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
